message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
I think we can do better, Alice! 55-45 is a fairer split.
Bob, the value is decreasing! Let's be reasonable, I'll take my previous offer of $55 and you get $45.  Any more rounds and we both lose out.
We're both losing out, but I still think I deserve a bit more. 52-48 is my final offer.
